event.description: Alfonso Soriano singles on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Ryan Theriot flies out to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Milton Bradley singles on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Lee. Alfonso Soriano to 2nd.
Aramis Ramirez flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Geovany Soto walks. Alfonso Soriano to 3rd. Milton Bradley to 2nd.
Reed Johnson triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Bourn. Alfonso Soriano scores. Milton Bradley scores. Geovany Soto scores.
With Micah Hoffpauir batting, passed ball by Ivan Rodriguez, Reed Johnson scores.
Micah Hoffpauir strikes out swinging.
Aaron Miles doubles (4) on a fly ball to left fielder Carlos Lee.
Rich Harden reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by catcher Ivan Rodriguez. Aaron Miles advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by third baseman Geoff Blum, assist to catcher Ivan Rodriguez.
Alfonso Soriano pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Ryan Theriot flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Milton Bradley pops out to second baseman Kazuo Matsui.
Aramis Ramirez walks.
Geovany Soto grounds into a double play, shortstop Miguel Tejada to second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman. Aramis Ramirez out at 2nd.
Reed Johnson grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Micah Hoffpauir grounds out, first baseman Lance Berkman to pitcher Mike Hampton.
Aaron Miles grounds out, pitcher Mike Hampton to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Rich Harden singles on a ground ball to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
Ryan Theriot grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Milton Bradley grounds out, third baseman Geoff Blum to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Aramis Ramirez singles on a fly ball to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Geovany Soto strikes out swinging.
Reed Johnson walks.
Micah Hoffpauir doubles (3) on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Pence. Reed Johnson to 3rd.
Aaron Miles walks.
With Rich Harden batting, passed ball by Ivan Rodriguez, Reed Johnson scores. Micah Hoffpauir to 3rd. Aaron Miles to 2nd.
Rich Harden called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Alberto Arias replaces Mike Hampton, batting 9th.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
Ryan Theriot strikes out swinging.
Milton Bradley grounds out, second baseman Kazuo Matsui to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Aramis Ramirez homers (4) on a fly ball to left field.
Geovany Soto grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Reed Johnson strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Alberto Arias. Reed Johnson to 1st.
Micah Hoffpauir grounds out to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Pitching Change: Wesley Wright replaces Alberto Arias, batting 9th, replacing Darin Erstad.
Aaron Miles grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Rich Harden strikes out swinging.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Jeff Fulchino replaces Wesley Wright, batting 9th.
Ryan Theriot flies out to center fielder Michael Bourn.
Milton Bradley grounds out to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Aramis Ramirez grounds out, shortstop Miguel Tejada to first baseman Lance Berkman.
Kazuo Matsui singles on a ground ball to second baseman Aaron Miles, deflected by pitcher Rich Harden.
Michael Bourn strikes out swinging.
Lance Berkman grounds into a force out, second baseman Aaron Miles to shortstop Ryan Theriot. Kazuo Matsui out at 2nd. Lance Berkman to 1st.
Carlos Lee grounds into a force out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to second baseman Aaron Miles. Lance Berkman out at 2nd.
Miguel Tejada grounds out, second baseman Aaron Miles to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Hunter Pence doubles (6) on a fly ball to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Geoff Blum grounds out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir. Hunter Pence to 3rd.
Ivan Rodriguez flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Mike Hampton strikes out swinging.
Kazuo Matsui singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Michael Bourn lines out to second baseman Aaron Miles.
Lance Berkman walks. Kazuo Matsui to 2nd.
With Carlos Lee batting, wild pitch by Rich Harden, Kazuo Matsui to 3rd. Lance Berkman to 2nd.
Carlos Lee walks.
Miguel Tejada pops out to second baseman Aaron Miles.
Hunter Pence singles on a ground ball to third baseman Aramis Ramirez.
Geoff Blum walks. Hunter Pence to 2nd.
Ivan Rodriguez grounds into a double play, shortstop Ryan Theriot to second baseman Aaron Miles to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir. Hunter Pence to 3rd. Geoff Blum out at 2nd.
Mike Hampton singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Hunter Pence scores.
Kazuo Matsui strikes out swinging.
Michael Bourn flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Lance Berkman grounds out, second baseman Aaron Miles to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Carlos Lee flies out to center fielder Reed Johnson.
Miguel Tejada lines out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Hunter Pence pops out to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir in foul territory.
Geoff Blum strikes out swinging.
Ivan Rodriguez grounds out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Darin Erstad replaces Alberto Arias.
Darin Erstad flies out to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Kazuo Matsui pops out to catcher Geovany Soto in foul territory.
Michael Bourn singles on a ground ball to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Lance Berkman homers (7) on a fly ball to left field. Michael Bourn scores.
Carlos Lee singles on a fly ball to right fielder Milton Bradley.
Pitching Change: Carlos Marmol replaces Rich Harden, batting 9th.
Miguel Tejada grounds into a force out, first baseman Micah Hoffpauir to shortstop Ryan Theriot. Carlos Lee out at 2nd. Miguel Tejada to 1st.
Hunter Pence grounds into a force out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to second baseman Aaron Miles. Miguel Tejada out at 2nd. Hunter Pence to 1st.
Geoff Blum pops out to third baseman Aramis Ramirez.
Pitching Change: Kevin Gregg replaces Carlos Marmol, batting 3rd, replacing right fielder Milton Bradley.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for Reed Johnson.
Defensive Substitution: Joey Gathright replaces pitcher Carlos Marmol, batting 9th, playing center field.
Ivan Rodriguez grounds out, third baseman Aramis Ramirez to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jason Michaels replaces Jeff Fulchino.
Jason Michaels strikes out swinging.
Kazuo Matsui grounds out, shortstop Ryan Theriot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
